mapper.select: select articleinfo.viewcount, userinfo.avatar,articleinfo.id,articleinfo.title,articleinfo.createtime,userinfo.username from articleinfo join userinfo on userinfo.id = articleinfo.userid order by articleinfo.createtime desc

select articleinfo.viewcount,articleinfo.id,articleinfo.title,articleinfo.createtime ,articleinfo.content,userinfo.username from articleinfo join userinfo on userinfo.id = articleinfo.userid where articleinfo.id = #{value}
mapper.update: update articleinfo set viewcount = viewcount+1 where id = #{value}
